list.description:
Merkava Mk.4M custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! This sight is not compatible with other tanks. This is only compatible with the specific Merkava Mk.4M. To have a sight compatible with every Merkava Mk.4 series tank check this link:(https://live.warthunder.com/post/1087933/en/).

For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profi...

Merkava Mk.4 custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! This sight is compatible with other tanks, but it will not fit the screen properly due to the different sight characteristics like FOV. This is only 100% compatible with the Mk.4 series of Merkava, including Mk.4M, but for Mk.4M I have made a specific one that includes the Trophy text, link:(https://live.warthunder.com/post/1087934/en/).

~SEMI-REALISTIC LEOPARD 2 SIGHTS~
4k, 1440p and 1080p. Difference: see document below
Realistic version: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1087706/en/

This pack includes multiple sights for ALL Leopard 2's in-game:

  • EMES 15 day and night sight for Leopard 2A4 (all versions), 2A5 (all versions), 2A6 (all versions), 2A7V, 2AV, Strv 121, 121B, 122A, 122B and 122B+.
  • FERO Z18 auxiliary sight for Leopard 2A4. (all versions), 2A5 (all versions), 2A6 (all versions) and Strv 121. All FERO Z18 sights are modified for...

Universal sights with and without additional lines, and size's.
I made some fixes, and a bit cleaner look.

Everyone's favourite definitely-not-cat being from the indie hit Oneshot - now on a roomba... and in War Thunder.

Made it mainly for personal use but still uploading it here.


#alltanks #oneshot #niko #videogames #roomba #plushie

HISTORICAL TOGS SIGHT FOR CHALLENGER MK.2 AND MK.3,DS

*Sight is made on base of sight from @TheSkyCrasher *
*Thanks for help to @Rastmust and @PotatoChips *

*Sight is for Challenger 1 only *

*Sight is made for 1920x1080 resolution*

VERSION 27.11.23.
-total reconstruction of sight to be as close to the historical as possible
-text reshaped
-brackets reshaped, put to the centre of the sight

VERSION 06.01.24.
-lines made thinner
-aiming reticle put more to the centre

VERSION 09.01.24.
-lines made thinner
-aiming reticle downsized,put more to the center again

VERSION ...

Pack of sights specially finalized for the event "Operation Maslenica" on Project Front. The main changes consist in adding a realistic field of view (FOV), as well as disabling the request for allies and rangefinder on those vehicles where it was historically absent.

The sights made by @RideR2, @Caff_Gunner, @РotatoСhiрs and @kuIoodporny were taken as a basis. Thank you for your sights.


#t_72a #t_72m1, #t_55a #t_34_85 #m18 #m36 #m36b2 #pt_76 #pt_76b #su_100 #zsu_57_2 #m53_59 #strela_10m2 #9m35m2 #ozelot

#m60a3tts #cm11

CN - M60A3TTS CM11勇虎 Sights
Zoom : 8.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m60a3_tts

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m60a3_tts

Aircraft collimator sights for the Typhoons and Tempest (Vickers P). The Tempest sight is ranged to work using the marks from 50m to 2km. Try not to actually use the 50m one... it might be the last thing you do.

To use RP-3's on the Typhoon:

Sights for SPAA novices to get their target easier

Description:
The sights include a few circles to tell players how much offset is needed for shooting a target with given target speed, aspect and shell speed, despite how far it is or whether it is getting closer or farther.

Sights for Sd.Kfz. 6/2, Ostwind 1/2, Wirbelwind, Kugelblitz, Zerstorer 45, M42 Contraereo, R3 T20 FA-HS, ZSU57-2, WZ305 and BTR-ZD are included. There are also sights for BegleitPz 57 and VCC80/60 (yep, they work as SPAAGs for me)

Updated on 2024.06.15
Duplicated the Ostwind2's sight for ...

This is a very simple sight that is built from u_nuub339's sight ( https://live.warthunder.com/post/1082972/en/ ). I made it for use with higher tier tanks that fire APFSDS at long range. As long as there is no in acurracy from your cannon your round will land right in the middle of where all 3 lines meet up. It features a open bottom so you can still see you target at long range, but is still very accurate, a easy to see and use range card off to the side if you do not have a laser range finder, as well as well placed hold markers for leading moving targets.

Historical sight for the Turán 3 with two versions

A little explanation:
The first distance indicator (the one on the left) is for the AP
The second one (the one next to the first) is for both the HE
The third and fourth one (the right ones) is for the machine gun
